CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Veracyte Inc is a genomic diagnostics company. It provides genomic diagnostic products and services to improve patient care against diseases such as thyroid cancer, lung cancer, and idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis. The firm's product portfolio consists of products such as Afirma analysis, Percepta, Envisia, and others. The company derives its revenues from the Sale of Afirma analysis product.

value.name: Steven French
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
